items.sentence: You\'ll never love me as much as I love you.
I\'ve been busy getting ready for the party.
I promise I won\'t tell anyone where Tom is.
You could\'ve stayed quiet, but you didn\'t.
Tom hasn\'t said anything since he got home.
Tom hasn\'t yet been asked to do that again.
I didn\'t know you were that good at French.
I don\'t have much money in my bank account.
I don\'t know how much longer I can do this.
Tom is a trombone player in the school band.
Tom is about thirty minutes behind schedule.
Tom is always broke by the end of the month.
Tom should be able to get it done by Monday.
It\'s been three years since I last saw Tom.
Tom very seldom kisses his children anymore.
Tom volunteered to be the designated driver.
Tom waited for what seemed like a long time.
Tom used to have a big house on Park Street.
Tom used to tell me stories about Australia.
Tom usually does his homework before dinner.
Can you spare me a few minutes of your time?
Can you teach me how to apologize in French?
Can you tell me where I can find a hospital?
Tom finds Mary\'s mother quite intimidating.
I didn\'t have Tom\'s permission to do that.
I didn\'t know Tom didn\'t know how to swim.
I think Tom really doesn\'t know the answer.
Tom plays table tennis just about every day.
I wonder who Tom sold his first painting to.
I know you don\'t ever want to see me again.
I know you wouldn\'t do something like that.
I know you\'re supposed to be working today.
Tom says he has other things to worry about.
Tom seems a little disappointed by the news.
Tell Tom that he needs to apologize to Mary.
Thank you for taking the time to talk to us.
I have to make certain Tom knows what to do.
I\'d like some toast if you are making some.
I want you to listen to what Tom has to say.
I want you to start taking things seriously.
I want you to stay here until Tom gets here.
Tom couldn\'t bribe Mary. However, he tried.
Tom says that he\'s feeling much better now.
I want to leave my farm to my grandchildren.
Why don\'t we all get together next weekend?
I\'m sure Tom won\'t want to sing that song.
I\'m sure Tom wouldn\'t allow me to do that.
Mary is a pretty girl, but has a bad temper.
Tom knew right away something wasn\'t right.
Tom has a good understanding of the problem.
